name: Make Pretty
func:
var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(msg.payload,null,2);
return {topic: msg.payload, payload:jsonPretty, 'filename':flow.get('deviceProps').configFile};

name: Settings Alarm Scan
Filter Websocket
Shift Msg

name: Get Signal Quality
Save global env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

    <style>
{{{payload.css}}}
    </style>

{{{payload.utilityScripts}}}

    </script>

name: Get SSID
func:
var ssid = msg.payload.substring(msg.payload.indexOf("ESSID") + 6).split('\n')[0];
return {topic:msg.topic, payload:{topic:msg.topic ,payload:ssid, userID: msg.userID }};
